title: From Ancient Farmers Lessons for Today's Amazon

tasks.task: Driving a bulldozer to remove deforested areas for farmland.
subtasks: Operating a bulldozer.
Steering the bulldozer to maneuver around obstacles.
Removing excess soil and debris.
Leveling the ground for the farmland.

tasks.task: Clearing land for agricultural use using a chainsaw.
subtasks: Starting a chainsaw.
Cutting down trees and underbrush with a chainsaw.
Hedging branches and small vegetation.
Clearing stumps and debris from the cleared area.

tasks.task: Planting crops in the prepared agricultural fields.
subtasks: Tilling the soil to prepare the planting bed.
Mixing fertilizer and soil amendments into the soil.
Planting seeds or seedlings in rows or beds.
Covering seeds or seedlings with soil.

tasks.task: Constructing raised beds for farming.
subtasks: Marking out the desired bed shape and dimensions.
Excavating soil to create raised areas.
Moving the excavated soil to form the raised beds.
Ensuring proper drainage around the beds.

tasks.task: Maintaining raised field cropping systems.
subtasks: Regularly monitoring plant growth and health.
Applying water through irrigation systems if necessary.
Checking for pests and diseases and taking appropriate measures.
Harvesting crops when ripe.

tasks.task: Using a chainsaw for felling timber for logging.
subtasks: Identifying trees for felling.
Safety checks on the chainsaw.
Cutting trees using a chainsaw.
Securing the fallen trees to prevent rolling.

tasks.task: Clearing forests for pastures as a cattle rancher.
subtasks: Cutting trees and vegetation to open the land for grazing.
Removing stumps and debris.
Setting up fences or other boundaries for cattle.
Providing water access for cattle.

tasks.task: Using a backhoe to create canals for irrigation or drainage.
subtasks: Determining the location and depth of the canals.
Digging the canals using a backhoe.
Connecting the canals to water sources.
Ensuring proper irrigation or drainage alignment.

tasks.task: Cutting trees for construction or firewood.
subtasks: Selecting trees for cutting.
Using a chainsaw or axe to fell trees.
Loading the cut wood onto a cart or trailer.
Stacking and storing the cut wood.

tasks.task: Responding to a fire in the deforested areas or fields.
subtasks: Alerting authorities or neighboring landowners about the fire.
Using tools like shovels or hoses to extinguish the fire.
Monitoring the area to prevent rekindling.

tasks.task: Using excavation equipment to clear land or create beds.
subtasks: Operating an excavation machine.
Hydroseeding or planting cover crops after clearing.
Testing soil samples for nutrient content.
Implementing farming techniques like crop rotation or no-till agriculture.

tasks.task: Applying fertilizer to the fields.
subtasks: Measuring the required amount of fertilizer.
Mixing fertilizer with water if needed.
Distributing the fertilizer evenly over the fields.
Timing fertilizer application based on crop needs.

tasks.task: Cutting trees for fuel sources.
subtasks: Selecting appropriate trees for fuel.
Felling the trees using chainsaws.
Processing the wood into usable fuel.
Storing the fuel for later use.

tasks.task: Cutting down trees using a machete or axe.
subtasks: Locating trees to be cut with a machete or axe.
Using tools to make initial cuts.
Finishing the cut with a swing from the back.

tasks.task: Using a cane knife to trim plants in a field.
subtasks: Identifying plants that need trimming.
Positioning the cane knife for a clean cut.
Removing excess foliage or damaged parts to ensure plant health.

tasks.task: Clearing brush using a brush cutter.
subtasks: Starting the brush cutter.
Directing the cutting head to clear underbrush or thick growth.
Protective measures while using the brush cutter.

tasks.task: Removing stumps using equipment.
subtasks: Selecting an appropriate tool or machine for stump removal.
Loosening the earth around the stump.
Cutting the stump to ground level.
Removing the remnants of the stump and filling the hole.

tasks.task: Maintaining irrigation systems.
subtasks: Inspecting pipes and channels for leaks.
Clearing blockages in the irrigation system.
Adjusting water flow as needed.
Repairs to any damaged parts of the system.

tasks.task: Granting permission from indigenous communities to use their land.
subtasks: Negotiating arrangements with the communities.
Ensuring compliance with cultural and environmental sensitivities.

tasks.task: Conducting ceremonies to ask permission from the land.
subtasks: Inviting indigenous spiritual leaders or shamans.
Performing rituals or ceremonies as per local traditions.

tasks.task: Conducting research in the study area.
subtasks: Gathering soil and plant samples.
Mapping the pre-Columbian farm beds and canals.
Documenting the site's agricultural practices.

tasks.task: Participating in community clean-up activities.
subtasks: Removing debris left from past agricultural use.
Clearing drains of sediment and vegetation.
Restoring areas affected by past farming practices.
